SEARCH
Package algorithms.imageProcessing.features.mser

Class MSEREdges

java.lang.Object
algorithms.imageProcessing.features.mser.MSEREdges
public class MSEREdges extends Object
class to explore the boundaries of the accumulated points in MSER regions to make edges that are complete contours (the level sets approach has a much larger pixel association than the few pixels of canny edges for example). It currently uses the level sets found in the MSER =made from greyscale and "H" of LCH color space images (caveat, configured to extract MSER regions from images from COTS of past several years binned to size near 256 X 256). The boundaries of the accumulated points in the regions are extracted and the high scoring points are kept where score is a combination of sobel color contrast and sobel greyscale intensity values). The class in not ready for use yet. NOTE that the default mode may change to the low contrast settings. Also note that there are fixed parameters tailored for the input images scaled to 256 X 256, especially for the use of merging (see int[] mszs = ...).
Author:
nichole
